name: citation
displayname: citation metadata

name: name
displayname: description

name: title
displayname: the main title of the dataset

name: subtitle
displayname: a secondary title that amplifies or states certain limitations on the main title

name: alternativetitle
displayname: either 1) a title commonly used to refer to the dataset or 2) an abbreviation of the main title

name: alternativeurl
displayname: another url where one can view or access the data in the dataset, e.g. a project or personal webpage

name: otherid
displayname: another unique identifier for the dataset (e.g. producer's or another repository's identifier)

name: otheridagency
displayname: the name of the agency that generated the other identifier

name: otheridvalue
displayname: another identifier uniquely identifies the dataset

name: author
displayname: the entity, e.g. a person or organization, that created the dataset

name: authorname
displayname: the name of the author, such as the person's name or the name of an organization
blockuri: 1) modified family name, given name or 2) modified organization xyz

name: authoraffiliation
displayname: the name of the entity affiliated with the author, e.g. an organization's name

name: authoridentifierscheme
displayname: the type of identifier that uniquely identifies the author (e.g. orcid, isni)

name: authoridentifier
displayname: uniquely identifies the author when paired with an identifier type

name: datasetcontact
displayname: the entity, e.g. a person or organization, that users of the dataset can contact with questions

name: datasetcontactname
displayname: the name of the point of contact, e.g. the person's name or the name of an organization

name: datasetcontactaffiliation
displayname: the name of the entity affiliated with the point of contact, e.g. an organization's name

name: datasetcontactemail
displayname: the point of contact's email address

name: dsdescription
displayname: a summary describing the purpose, nature, and scope of the dataset

name: dsdescriptionvalue
displayname: a summary describing the purpose, nature, and scope of the dataset

name: dsdescriptiondate
displayname: the date when the description was added to the dataset. if the dataset contains more than one description, e.g. the data producer supplied one description and the data repository supplied another, this date is used to distinguish between the descriptions

name: subject
displayname: the area of study relevant to the dataset

name: keyword
displayname: a key term that describes an important aspect of the dataset and information about any controlled vocabulary used

name: keywordvalue
displayname: a key term that describes important aspects of the dataset

name: keywordvocabulary
displayname: the controlled vocabulary used for the keyword term (e.g. lcsh, mesh)

name: keywordvocabularyuri
displayname: the url where one can access information about the term's controlled vocabulary

name: topicclassification
displayname: indicates a broad, important topic or subject that the dataset covers and information about any controlled vocabulary used

name: topicclassvalue
displayname: a topic or subject term

name: topicclassvocab
displayname: the controlled vocabulary used for the keyword term (e.g. lcsh, mesh)

name: topicclassvocaburi
displayname: the url where one can access information about the term's controlled vocabulary

name: publication
displayname: the article or report that uses the data in the dataset. the full list of related publications will be displayed on the metadata tab

name: publicationcitation
displayname: the full bibliographic citation for the related publication

name: publicationidtype
displayname: the type of identifier that uniquely identifies a related publication

name: publicationidnumber
displayname: the identifier for a related publication

name: publicationurl
displayname: the url form of the identifier entered in the identifier field, e.g. the doi url if a doi was entered in the identifier field. used to display what was entered in the id type and id number fields as a link. if what was entered in the identifier field has no url form, the url of the publication webpage is used, e.g. a journal article webpage

name: notestext
displayname: additional information about the dataset

name: language
displayname: a language that the dataset's files is written in

name: producer
displayname: the entity, such a person or organization, managing the finances or other administrative processes involved in the creation of the dataset

name: producername
displayname: the name of the entity, e.g. the person's name or the name of an organization

name: produceraffiliation
displayname: the name of the entity affiliated with the producer, e.g. an organization's name

name: producerabbreviation
displayname: the producer's abbreviated name (e.g. iqss, icpsr)

name: producerurl
displayname: the url of the producer's website

name: producerlogourl
displayname: the url of the producer's logo

name: productiondate
displayname: the date when the data were produced (not distributed, published, or archived)

name: productionplace
displayname: the location where the data and any related materials were produced or collected

name: contributor
displayname: the entity, such as a person or organization, responsible for collecting, managing, or otherwise contributing to the development of the dataset

name: contributortype
displayname: indicates the type of contribution made to the dataset

name: contributorname
displayname: the name of the contributor, e.g. the person's name or the name of an organization

name: grantnumber
displayname: information about the dataset's financial support

name: grantnumberagency
displayname: the agency that provided financial support for the dataset

name: grantnumbervalue
displayname: the grant identifier or contract identifier of the agency that provided financial support for the dataset

name: distributor
displayname: the entity, such as a person or organization, designated to generate copies of the dataset, including any editions or revisions

name: distributorname
displayname: the name of the entity, e.g. the person's name or the name of an organization

name: distributoraffiliation
displayname: the name of the entity affiliated with the distributor, e.g. an organization's name

name: distributorabbreviation
displayname: the distributor's abbreviated name (e.g. iqss, icpsr)

name: distributorurl
displayname: the url of the distributor's webpage

name: distributorlogourl
displayname: the url of the distributor's logo image, used to show the image on the dataset's page

name: distributiondate
displayname: the date when the dataset was made available for distribution/presentation

name: depositor
displayname: the entity, such as a person or organization, that deposited the dataset in the repository

name: dateofdeposit
displayname: the date when the dataset was deposited into the repository

name: timeperiodcovered
displayname: the time period that the data refer to. also known as span. this is the time period covered by the data, not the dates of coding, collecting data, or making documents machine-readable

name: timeperiodcoveredstart
displayname: the start date of the time period that the data refer to

name: timeperiodcoveredend
displayname: the end date of the time period that the data refer to

name: dateofcollection
displayname: the dates when the data were collected or generated

name: dateofcollectionstart
displayname: the date when the data collection started

name: dateofcollectionend
displayname: the date when the data collection ended

name: kindofdata
displayname: the type of data included in the files (e.g. survey data, clinical data, or machine-readable text)

name: series
displayname: information about the dataset series to which the dataset belong

name: seriesname
displayname: the name of the dataset series

name: seriesinformation
displayname: can include 1) a history of the series and 2) a summary of features that apply to the series

name: software
displayname: information about the software used to generate the dataset

name: softwarename
displayname: the name of software used to generate the dataset

name: softwareversion
displayname: the version of the software used to generate the dataset, e.g. 4.11

name: relatedmaterial
displayname: information, such as a persistent id or citation, about the material related to the dataset, such as appendices or sampling information available outside of the dataset

name: relateddatasets
displayname: information, such as a persistent id or citation, about a related dataset, such as previous research on the dataset's subject

name: otherreferences
displayname: information, such as a persistent id or citation, about another type of resource that provides background or supporting material to the dataset

name: datasources
displayname: information, such as a persistent id or citation, about sources of the dataset (e.g. a book, article, serial, or machine-readable data file)

name: originofsources
displayname: for historical sources, the origin and any rules followed in establishing them as sources

name: characteristicofsources
displayname: characteristics not already noted elsewhere

name: accesstosources
displayname: 1) methods or procedures for accessing data sources and 2) any special permissions needed for access

name: datasetfield
displayname: identifier
